Softwares, Gears Gurpreet Singh Uses

I get a lot of questions about what kind of gears, softwares I use. To make it easier to share, I've collected a list here.

Gears

Apple MacBook Pro 2021 (14")

  • #computer

This is my personal coding computer. Processor M1 Pro Chip, 8-Core CPU, 16-Core GPU, 16 GB RAM, 512 GB SSD.

more info

Keychron K2 (US layout)

  • #keyboard

Hot-Swap Mechanical Bluetooth Keyboard (Mac) with Keycap/Gateron Brown Switch/USB C, Compact Wireless RGB.

more info

Logitech MX Anywhere 3 (Mac)

  • #mouse

A perfect mouse with zero lag in doing daily work with 4000 DPI sensor, customizable buttons, USB-C, Bluetooth

more info

Bose QC 35II Headphones

  • #audio
  • #headphones

My goto headphones, I am using them on my iPhone, Mac, sometimes with my LG TV ;)

more info

AirPods 2

  • #audio
  • #headphones

You already know about them :)

more info

SAMSUNG Odyssey G5 (27")

  • #workspace
  • #monitor

A perfect 2K HDR Curved Gaming monitor with active AMD FreeSync (144 Hz), I am using it for gaming (with PS5).

more info

TitanWolf Mate

  • #workspace
  • #monitor

Nice mate which compliments to my workspace.

more info

IKEA height-adjustable table

  • #workspace

I don't want to set for 8 hours while working, I try to stand at least a little bit each day. This desk has been great for that. I like the color of this which goes perfectly fine with other stuff on my table.

more info

BONTEC Monitor Arm

  • #workspace

Fully adjustable monitor arm that can easily handle weight of SAMSUNG Odyssey G5 (27") monitor.

more info

Quntis Monitor USB LED Lamp

  • #workspace

Care about your eyes, please use a lamp on your monitor. It helps to reduce raises coming from your monitor.

more info

Where I write my code.

  • #coding

Perfect theme for coding by Sarah Drasner

An open source font which makes coding simply a fun.

more info

iTerm2

  • #coding

I started using it long time ago, because I simply hate default terminal from Mac.

more info

Oh My ZSH!

  • #coding

It gives perfect detailing to git repositories.

more info

Powerlevel10k

  • #coding

Powerlevel10k is a theme for Zsh. It emphasizes speed, flexibility and out-of-the-box experience.

more info

Brave

  • #browser

Because I am privacy freak ;)
